articles.title: 'That's a slap in the face': Southern Dallas remains home to food deserts as H-E-B expands into Plano, Frisco - WFAA.com

articles.content:
PLANO, Texas Grocery shoppers around North Texas rejoiced on Friday at the news of two H-E-B stores coming to Frisco and Plano, with plans to open next fall.
